alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:49PM CDT until July 03 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 349 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blaine, or 9 miles southeast of Ruleville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Schlater around 430 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
